dataList.dlg: Have you completed your employees' uniform inspections? Should I see any other employee engaging in Suppression with their sleeves unbuttoned like last time...
'Cheers' are nothing more than placation sought by those weak of will. The Information Team endeavors for something more... worthwhile, don't we?
I understand that most employees are currently under a lot of stress. Let us quickly see this battle to the end.
No other expression is as meaningless and inefficient as that "cheer up". That is why I refuse to say it.
The Suppression target is cornered. You could yield a very effective result with a proper strike.
The entity is waiting for us to strike it down. Let's take care of this efficiently.
Yes, I am aware that there are wounded employees. Please, discard your half-hearted sense of empathy.
One of the employees has lost their cool. Be careful not to let the enemy know of this weakness.
Suppression target defeated. Let us deal with the remaining entities with the same efficacy.
We have suffered some losses in personnel. This urgency takes precedence to pointing fingers. Let us hurry.
The entities have an edge over us at the moment. I did not expect this much disparity in capabilities; we lacked enough information to predict this.
We have an edge over them. I am already seeing several employees who have broken the rules as written in the manual... but I will press upon this matter at a later time.
An employee is at risk of death. Please focus.
The entities have struck a powerful blow against our employees. I expect that we will suffer heavy damage.
It is difficult to read their current strategy. Please focus, and carefully observe their movements.
That was the correct way to strike that entity. This is the power of intelligence.
That was an inefficient strike. I see that some employees have clearly neglected to even skim over the enemy records.
A precise strike against their weakness. I see that you have come here prepared.
That was not an effective type of attack against this entity. Please, we are the 'Information' Team. Make use of it.
It appears that the entity has a certain advantage. Let's keep our eyes on that one.
The entity is at a certain disadvantage. Now, let's think about how we can exploit this opportunity to our benefit.
We have the upper hand. Victory may not be so far if we were to push on.
The entity has done... something. This battle may take longer than I had anticipated.
An entity's part is broken. I see that you have at least read the manual.
There is an entity with a broken part. Quickly destroy its other parts as well.
The entity has a broken part. The circumstances could not be more ideal for us.
One of the employees is fatally wounded. All deaths are meaningless, as I always like to repeat myself. Now, you best come up with a way to mitigate these losses.
One of the employees is in a critical state. Suppress the entity before you suffer greater losses.
You have dealt a successful, fatal strike against the entity. I hope you can continue to display such shrewd tactics in the battles to come.
Attempt the same fatal strike against the entity.

Ah, as I live and breathe, there is an employee who may be a shining example to all. That was a very efficient way to deal with the entities, an accomplishment befitting the excellent capabilities of the Information Team.
I am Yesod of the Information Team. Let us make use of the most efficient intelligence to quickly Suppress our enemies.
